about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS DEMO
A 19 years old Adam Strom comes back home from finishing his Army obligations for his country, but not everything looks as it appears.

Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - False Awakening is a small portion of the beginning of Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - Prologue.

Who are we
We are Sitting Ducks Productions, a new indie studio from Europe, and this is our first project out of many.
This game is a dream come true for everyone in our studio and will set in motion the beginning of the development of the Lost Traces Saga. At this stage, we focus mostly on this one project, which is in fact a life’s work for our Lead Developer, Game Designer, writer, and sole creator, Stavros Theologou, who for the past 7 years set his mind, vision, and gaming experience to paper by creating a story worthy of a Saga. Alongside him, stands a team of friends and family, full of passion for gaming and creativity both in visuals and voice acting.

Get a taste of what's to come
Have a quick look of what to expect from Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - Prologue as it features some of the key elements from the main game.

Unreal Engine 5.2
We put a lot of emphasis on graphics, sounds, and the atmosphere as a whole. With realistic yet retro vibes inspired by old point-and-click adventure horror games while harnessing the power of Unreal Engine 5.2

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - False Awakening

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience a small portion of the "Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - Prologue" game through the eyes of Evelyn and Adam Strom. Battle through your personal demons and escape your personal prison, a dark and twisted part of your subconsciousness.
